comment: Joan Golding was the most confused and uncooperative instructor I ever had.  She changed directions from the class to private emails and had no interest in free thinking or using the Adobe Creative Suite which is imperative for a Graphic Design Instructor.  She was also extremely sarcastic and talked to college students like they were in 3rd grade.
Great class, very easy, all you have to do is read and discuss the concepts in papers, the text was easy to understand, plus the instructor provided a lecture and written breakdown for every chapter.

Great Instructor:  Did a great job with difficult, disrespectful students.  If you apply yourself and focus on how to get a good grade, not on being disruptive, you can do great in her class.  I did well, I passed and she was very helpful to me in improving my work,and helped me throughout the class.

Class is completely useless. She will argue with you about anything. She picks favorites and is very discriminatory. She is not willing to help the students with anything. If you care about your grade, do not take her class.

Horrible teaching skills.  She has done a lot in the communications world and will tell you about it, but she has not idea how to teach a class.  Very confrontational, will argue about the simplest things.  I made and A in her class b/c I sucked up and played her little game.  Do the assignment like the examples int he book and you'll be all right.

You really have to apply yourself in this class. I lost several nights of sleep on writing assignments. The professor has high expectations, a little too high for an entry-level course. Still, I think she is good at what she does. I learned a lot.
I can't imagine having a worse teacher. If your grades mean anything to you DO NOT take this class.

I hated this class. The professor is disorganized and doesn't practice what she preaches. If she says you can do something, write it down and have her sign it. She treats students like they're inferior and loves to argue. Don't waste your money on this class.  You won't learn anything.

She likes to argue and yell at students. Once, in class, she yelled at the entire class. If you want your tuition's worth, don't take her. She reads straight from the book and says "I'll get back to you on that" when you have a question. She's also extremely discriminatory. Watch out. Her tests are vague, so don't study TOO hard.
Seems like easy material but everyone gets C's on the tests. She is very confrontational. She grades presentations extreeeeeemly hard. DON'T TAKE HER CLASS.
veeery easy class. but boring. she's really nice. not too strict on attendance, but she gives extra stuff to students who do attend.
One of the easist professors as far as Public Speaking goes. Not as strict as all the others. Extremely boring though. Reads straight from the book for lectures and spends too much time on speeches.
